name: GSToggleSwitch
summary: An animate switch collection, Add Beautiful Customise Switch in your application to boost UI and UX.
description: The ToggleSwitch library is a lightweight and easy-to-use solution for implementing customizable toggle switches in your iOS, MacOS and AppleVision projects. Designed to offer a visually appealing and interactive way to represent binary states (like on/off), this library is ideal for enhancing user interfaces with intuitive toggle controls.
